import { useState, useContext, useEffect } from "react" import StepSettingsBar from "./Bar" import Window from "./Window" import Days from "./Days" import WhichEmail from "./WhichEmail" import {GlobalContext} from "../../GlobalProvider" const StepSettingsModal = (props) => { const [progress, setProgress] = useState(1) const {step} = useContext(GlobalContext) const [addStep, setAddStep] = step const [window, setWindow] = useState("") const [selectedDays, setSelectedDays] = useState(addStep[props.index]["days"] !== null ? addStep[props.index]["days"] : ["MON","TUE","WED","THU","FRI","SAT","SUN"]) const [selectedEmail, setSelectedEmail] = useState(addStep[props.index]["whichEmail"]) useEffect(() => { console.log(props.index) }) const prevStep = () => { setProgress(progress!==0 ? progress - 1 : null) } const nextStep = () => { setProgress(progress!==5 ? progress + 1 : null) } const selectProgress = (number) => { setProgress(number) } const handleCallback = () => { addStep[props.index]["deliveryWindow"] = window addStep[props.index]["days"] = selectedDays addStep[props.index]["whichEmail"] = selectedEmail props.toggler() } switch(progress){ case 1: return(
) case 2: return(
) case 3: return(
) case 4: return(

Hello4

) case 5: return(

Hello5

) default: return( "hello" ) } } export default StepSettingsModal
